Advanced data
Item ID1603

A ruby is a red gem used in Crafting and Fletching. Rubies can be cut from uncut rubies with level 34 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 85 experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make ruby jewellery.

A one-time reward of two cut rubies can be obtained by using a chisel and hammer on Thammaron's throne during The Golem quest. Four cut rubies are also obtained as a reward for completing Olaf's Quest.

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Rubies can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a gold bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
34 Uncut ruby 1,222 Ruby 911 −311 85 246,500 −3.66
34 Ruby Gold bar 996 Ruby ring 1,009 13 70 45,500 0.19
40 Ruby Gold bar 996 Ruby necklace 1,115 119 75 48,750 1.59
42 Ruby Gold bar 996 Ruby bracelet 1,158 162 80 52,000 2.03
50 Ruby Gold bar 996 Ruby amulet (u) 1,036 40 85 55,250 0.47
1 Ruby amulet (u) Ball of wool 1,076 Ruby amulet 1,135 59 4 8,000 14.75
  1. ^ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Ruby jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-3 Enchant, requiring level 49 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 5 Fire runes, and the piece of Ruby Jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Material Cost[1] Enchanted Sell price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Ruby ring 1,009 1,125 Ring of forging 1,005 −120 59 94,400 −2.03
Ruby necklace 1,115 1,231 Digsite pendant Not Sold −1,231 59 94,400 −20.86
Ruby bracelet 1,158 1,274 Inoculation bracelet 1,259 −15 59 94,400 −0.25
Ruby amulet 1,135 1,251 Amulet of strength 1,244 −7 59 94,400 −0.12
  1. ^ Cost calculated using a Staff of fire (provides unlimited Fire runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.

Combined[edit | edit source]

Requires 49 Magic; for XP rates and Crafting requirements, see above tables. Assumes a Staff of Fire is wielded for enchantment.

Materials Material cost Product Product value Profit
Ruby Gold bar Cosmic rune 1,112 Ring of forging 1,005 −107
Ruby Gold bar Cosmic rune 1,112 Digsite pendant Not sold −1,112
Ruby Gold bar Cosmic rune 1,112 Inoculation bracelet 1,259 147
Ruby Gold bar Cosmic rune Ball of wool 1,152 Amulet of strength 1,244 92

Other[edit | edit source]

Cut Rubies can also be used to make the following items:

  • Ruby bolt tips, which require level 63 Fletching and yield 6 experience per gem
  • Two cut Rubies are used during the Family Crest quest along with two 'perfect' gold bars to create the 'perfect' ring and 'perfect' necklace
  • 250 rubies alongside various items can be exchanged for a Curator's medallion, required for mounting a Digsite Pendant in the POH

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

Gems available on free-to-play worlds can no longer be crushed with a hammer to receive a members object (crushed gem).
